Package.Name: 15m Spot Circle
Package.Description: Shows a 15m Circle around your tank. \r\nIt shows the minimum distance behind bushes to stay hidden if you are shooting.\r\nThe Ring is not displayed in sniper view.

Tank Rating Colors [by {author}]
Package.InternalNotes: Maybe conflict with "Contour skins with areas of penetration" or just hard to see
Package.Author: CHAMPi
Package.Description:
Repaints tanks based on winrate or WGR value without any textures!
use ESC in the hangar and then click on MOD Settings

features:
 - you can decide which tank parts are painted (hull, chassis, turret, gun)
 - you can choose which tanks are painted (enemy tanks, ally tanks and/or your own tank)
 - you can control if camouflages are removed before the tanks are painted (not all are currently removed - in work!)
 - you can set the gloss and metallic effect for the color.
 - graphical user interface to control the most important settings

Package.Name: PROTanki
Package.InternalNotes: 2020-08-27_willster419:\r\nversion 2.4 is the latest on their website, works with 1.10.0.1
Package.Description:
Combat efficiency calculator for World of Tanks.

Maud calculates the expected damage for each tank right during the battle.

The negative value of the damage shows how much you need to fill the damage so that its value is above average.

He considers the costs of silver spent in combat.

Package.Name: TessuMod - WOT/Teamspeak integration (installation guide in description) [by {author}]
Package.InternalNotes: 2020-10-19:\r\nAs of now, the mod is broken and the dev does not plan to actively maintain it:\r\nhttps://github.com/jhakonen/wot-teamspeak-mod/issues/40#issuecomment-711068950
Package.Author: jhakonen
Package.Description:
A modification for integrating TeamSpeak into Garage and Battle.

Only works with the 64bit version of Teamspeak!

YOU MUST ACTIVATE THE MOD IN TEAMSPEAK FIRST!
 to add it to your teamspeak installation, finish the installation of mods and then go to your WoT-directory (..\World_of_Tanks\mods\versiondir\TessuMod\). there you doubleclick the file "tessumod_plugin_0.8.0_win64.ts3_plugin" and follow the on-screen-steps.

More instructions here: 
http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/433614-09171-tessumod-wotteamspeak-integration-mod-v0613-26032017/#topmost

Package.Name: Wide Border of Maps
Package.Description:
This mod was made to help people with color blindness. 

WIDE - borderline width = 1 pixel
INTENSIVE - the borderline width = 20 pixels

GRID - like "INTENSIVE"; with gridlines (10x10).
EXTRAGRID - like "INTENSIVE" with gridlines (50x50).

COMMAND - like "GRID", but with numbered grids (big font).
SPG - like "GRID", but with numbered grids (small font).
